verses.verse: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> that [were] with him rose up early יְרֻבַּ֜עַל <S%H3378><s%> Then Jerubbaal ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גִדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> who [is] Gideon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside עֵ֣ין חֲרֹ֑ד <S%H5878><s%> beside the well of Harod וּמַחֲנֵ֤ה <S%H4264><s%> so that the host מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> of the Midianites הָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֣וֹ מִצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> were on the north side מִגִּבְעַ֥ת <S%H1389><s%> of them by the hill הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <S%H4176><s%> of Moreh בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> in the valley

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> unto Gideon רַ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> that [are] with thee [are] too many הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> The people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for מִתִּתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> for me to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> the Midianites בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> into their hands פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> would יִתְפָּאֵ֨ר <S%H6286><s%> vaunt עָלַ֤י <S%H5921><s%> for יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> lest Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> themselves against me saying יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> Mine own hand הוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <S%H3467><s%> hath saved לִּֽי׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> henceforth קְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> proclaim נָ֜א <S%H4994><s%> Now therefore go to בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <S%H241><s%> in the ears הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> any יָרֵ֣א <S%H3373><s%> Whosoever [is] fearful וְחָרֵ֔ד <S%H2730><s%> and afraid יָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> let him return וְיִצְפֹּ֖ר <S%H6852><s%> and depart early מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> from mount הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> And there returned מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and two אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand נִשְׁאָֽרוּ׃ <S%H7604><s%> and there remained ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> unto Gideon עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> are still הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> The people רָב֒ <S%H7227><s%> [are] yet [too] many הוֹרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> bring them down אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> unto the water וְאֶצְרְפֶ֥נּוּ <S%H6884><s%> and I will try לְךָ֖ שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> of whom אֹמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> them for thee there and it shall be [that] of whom I say אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> This יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go אִתָּ֗ךְ <S%H854><s%> for ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> but וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of whom אֹמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> with thee and of whomsoever I say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> about זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> one לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> go

וַיּ֥וֹרֶד <S%H3381><s%> So he brought down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> unto the water ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> unto Gideon כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָלֹק֩ <S%H3952><s%> Every one that lappeth בִּלְשׁוֹנ֨וֹ <S%H3956><s%> with his tongue מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמַּ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who יָלֹ֣ק <S%H3952><s%> lappeth הַכֶּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> as a dog תַּצִּ֤יג <S%H3322><s%> him shalt thou set אוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> לְבָ֔ד <S%H905><s%> shall separate וְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִכְרַ֥ע <S%H3766><s%> by himself likewise every one that boweth down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בִּרְכָּ֖יו <S%H1290><s%> upon his knees לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> to drink

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפַּ֞ר <S%H4557><s%> And the number הַֽמֲלַקְקִ֤ים <S%H3952><s%> of them that lapped בְּיָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> [putting] their hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פִּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> to their mouth שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> were three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> but all the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people כָּרְע֥וּ <S%H3766><s%> bowed down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בִּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1290><s%> upon their knees לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> unto Gideon בִּשְׁלֹשׁ֩ <S%H7969><s%> By the three מֵא֨וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men הַֽמֲלַקְקִים֙ <S%H3952><s%> that lapped אוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <S%H3467><s%> will I save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> you and deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> the Midianites בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and let all the [other] people יֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> go אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> unto his place

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֵדָה֩ <S%H6720><s%> victuals הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> So the people בְּיָדָ֜ם <S%H3027><s%> in their hand וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> שׁוֹפְרֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H7782><s%> and their trumpets וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> [the rest of] Israel שִׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> and he sent אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְאֹֽהָלָ֔יו <S%H168><s%> unto his tent וּבִשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> those three מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men הֶֽחֱזִ֑יק <S%H2388><s%> and retained וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> and the host מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become ל֖וֹ מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> was beneath him in the valley פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> And it came to pass the same night הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> now the same וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD ק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> unto him Arise רֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> get thee down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the host כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נְתַתִּ֖יו <S%H5414><s%> for I have delivered בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> it into thine hand

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יָרֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> But if thou fear אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לָרֶ֑דֶת <S%H3381><s%> to go down רֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> down אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you וּפֻרָ֥ה <S%H6513><s%> thou with Phurah נַעַרְךָ֖ <S%H5288><s%> thy servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> to the host

וְשָֽׁמַעְתָּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> And thou shalt hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> what they say וְאַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> and afterward תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <S%H2388><s%> be strengthened יָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H3027><s%> shall thine hands וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <S%H3381><s%> to go down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> unto the host וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> Then went he down הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וּפֻרָ֣ה <S%H6513><s%> with Phurah נַעֲר֔וֹ <S%H5288><s%> his servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> unto the outside הַחֲמֻשִׁ֖ים <S%H2571><s%> of the armed men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that was בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> that [were] in the host

וּמִדְיָ֨ן <S%H4080><s%> And the Midianites וַעֲמָלֵ֤ק <S%H6002><s%> and the Amalekites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and all the children קֶ֙דֶם֙ <S%H6924><s%> of the east נֹפְלִ֣ים <S%H5307><s%> lay בָּעֵ֔מֶק <S%H6010><s%> along in the valley כָּאַרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H697><s%> like grasshoppers לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> for multitude וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H1581><s%> and their camels אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> were without מִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> [were] without number כַּח֛וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand שֶׁעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> side הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> by the sea לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> was come גִדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And when Gideon וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> behold [there was] a man מְסַפֵּ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> that told לְרֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> unto his fellow חֲל֑וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream חָלַ֗מְתִּי <S%H2492><s%> Behold I dreamed וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold [צְלֹול כ] (צְלִ֜יל <S%H6742><s%> cake ק) לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread שְׂעֹרִים֙ <S%H8184><s%> of barley מִתְהַפֵּךְ֙ <S%H2015><s%> tumbled בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> into the host מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הָ֠אֹהֶל <S%H168><s%> unto a tent וַיַּכֵּ֧הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and smote וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <S%H5307><s%> it that it fell וַיַּהַפְכֵ֥הוּ <S%H2015><s%> and turned לְמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> upside וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> lay along הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> it that the tent

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered רֵעֵ֤הוּ <S%H7453><s%> And his fellow וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is nothing זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בִּלְתִּ֗י <S%H1115><s%> because אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo חֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> This [is] nothing else save the sword גִּדְע֥וֹן <S%H1439><s%> of Gideon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> delivered הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> hath God בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [for] into his hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> Midian וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> and all the host פ

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard גִּדְע֜וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And it was [so] when Gideon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְפַּ֧ר <S%H4557><s%> the telling הַחֲל֛וֹם <S%H2472><s%> of the dream וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁבְר֖וֹ <S%H7667><s%> and the interpretation וַיִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <S%H7812><s%> thereof that he worshipped וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> and returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> into the host יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ק֔וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Arise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּיֶדְכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> into your hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> the host מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian

וַיַּ֛חַץ <S%H2673><s%> And he divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> the three מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> [into] three רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> companies וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and he put שׁוֹפָר֤וֹת <S%H7782><s%> a trumpet בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> in every man's hand כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all וְכַדִּ֣ים <S%H3537><s%> pitchers רֵקִ֔ים <S%H7386><s%> with empty וְלַפִּדִ֖ים <S%H3940><s%> and lamps בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within הַכַּדִּֽים׃ <S%H3537><s%> the pitchers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about מִמֶּ֥נִּי <S%H4480><s%> to them תִרְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> unto them Look וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> likewise תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> on me and do וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I בָא֙ <S%H935><s%> likewise and behold when I come בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> to the outside הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> it shall be [that] as I do כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> likewise תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> so shall ye do

וְתָקַעְתִּי֙ <S%H8628><s%> When I blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> with a trumpet אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> for וּתְקַעְתֶּ֨ם <S%H8628><s%> I and all that [are] with me then blow בַּשּׁוֹפָר֜וֹת <S%H7782><s%> ye the trumpets גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you סְבִיבוֹת֙ <S%H5439><s%> also on every side כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> of all the camp וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> and say לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [The sword] of the LORD וּלְגִדְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1439><s%> and of Gideon פ
